title: Two Hour Kayaking Session on the River Thames for £16 with Kayaking London
highlights:
• Learn the basics of kayaking, no experience necessary
  • Take in iconic sites including Battersea Power Station or the Houses of Parliament
  • Hot showers and changing rooms with secure storage for valuables
  • Guides qualified by British Canoe Union
  • Centre based adjacent to Cremorne Gardens, close to Fulham Broadway

title: Three Nordic Walking Sessions Including Technique Training for £14 with TryNordic (£49 Value)
highlights:
• Suitable for all ages and abilities
  • Equipment included
  • Work upper and lower body
  • Professionally qualified Nordic Walking instructors
  • Great cardio workout
  • Engages core muscles
